name: Heidevolk
description: '''Heidevolk''' ({{IPA|nl|ˈhɛi̯dəˌvɔlk}}) is a Dutch [[folk metal]] band. The lyrical themes of their music are inspired by nature, the history of [[Gelderland]], and [[Germanic mythology]]. Most of their lyrics are in Dutch; however, on their 2015 album, ''[[Velua]]'', they have one original English song, "Vinland", and several English covers. Their 2018 album, ''Vuur van verzet'', contains two English-language songs: "A Wolf in My Heart" and "The Alliance".
